title: Mesa 24.0 Linux Graphics Stack Released with NVK and RADV Driver Improvements
description:
The Mesa 24.0 open-source graphics stack has been released today as a major update that introduces new features and many improvements for several of the included graphics drivers.

The post Mesa 24.0 Linux Graphics Stack Released with NVK and RADV Driver Improvements appeared first on Linux Today.

title: GNOME Finally Decides to Step Up & Revamp its Documentation For Contributors
description:
The GNOME Project Handbook (handbook.gnome.org) is meant to act as a one-stop documentation resource for GNOME contributors, not for providing user documentation, homepages for apps/libraries, or technical documentation.

The post GNOME Finally Decides to Step Up & Revamp its Documentation For Contributors appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Cygwin 3.5.0 Drops Older Windows Platform Support
description:
New Cygwin 3.5.0 drops Windows 7/8 support, introduces advanced file system features, improved package info, and more. Learn what’s new!

The post Cygwin 3.5.0 Drops Older Windows Platform Support appeared first on Linux Today.

title: Vanilla OS 2 Orchid Beta Unveils Revolutionary Hybrid Debian Base and OCI Image Updates
description:
After many months of development, the Vanilla OS 2 “Orchid” beta is now available for testing.

The post Vanilla OS 2 Orchid Beta Unveils Revolutionary Hybrid Debian Base and OCI Image Updates appeared first on Linux Today.
